A sneak peek at the new Goodsie Store Creator

01 May 2013

Goodsie - The most powerful and intuitive e-commerce design system yet. from Hiidef on Vimeo.

My name is Jack Zerby, and I am a founder and designer at Flavors.me, and Goodsie. I was the Director of Design at Vimeo, and a designer at Pentagram, Frog, and RG/A. I also podcast at Marketing For Founders.
Howdy. I listen to over 100 podcasts a month, read articles and books like a banchee, attend countless webinars, and scour the web for anything that helps build startups. I will send you actionable tips based on what I found. Fo free.
